name: Monster Mash: Week 1
description:
DISCLAIMER: THIS GAME WORKS BEST IN CHROME, EDGE AND FIREFOX. THE GAME DOES NOT WORK IN SAFARI

A classic tale of getting stuck in the UTS elevators. An escape the room style puzzle in the setting of a creepy university elevator.

This game was created as a part of the Playmakers x UAG MONSTER MASH event. Check it out here: https://utsplaymakers.github.io/monstermash

CREDITS

Programming: DevSledge (devsledge.itch.io)

Images & Art: Chloe Spanos and Luis Lagman (@pio_hag on Instagram)

Sound effects obtained from www.zapsplat.com

Music:

Kevin Macleod - Ghost Story

Defphonix - Elevator Music

Special thanks to UTS Playmakers, Animation Guild and our beta testers for making this possible
